text-2.title: Text Widget
text-2.text:
Program testing can be used to show the presence of bugs, but never to show their absence! Premature optimization is the root of all evil in programming. A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.

In Order To Understand Recursion, One Must First Understand Recursion.

text-3.title: Text Widget
text-3.text: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight. C makes it easy to shoot yourself in the foot; C++ makes it harder, but when you do, it blows away your whole leg. I don't care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!
